document.full_text: a judge's derailment of google's plan to build a digital library and bookstore was seen by some scholars and librarians as a chance to pursue a better universal public library.
document.title: ruling spurs effort to form digital public library
lines_and_colors: a judge's derailment of google's plan to build a digital library and bookstore was seen by some scholars and librarians as a chance to pursue a better universal public library.
